author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower valve stud guard…I like using 1-1/2” by 5” self nailing stud guards inside showers. I don’t use a router to recess it. The backer board will indent just enough and there won’t be a hump. You can route the stud, but frankly it’s a waste of time, just one opinion 🔥#plumbing #bathroomremodel #homerenovation #homerepairtutor
title: Shower Valve Stud Guard - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor
